= Introduction =

Several experimental ZK Widgets is useful but not yet included in official release.


= Details =

[https://github.com/peterkuo/zk_anchorlayout Anchor Layout] : A layout component that can decide children size base on parent.

[http://code.google.com/p/zk5/wiki/SwifttabUsage Swifttab] : A more lighter tab and draggable tabs support . 

[http://code.google.com/p/zk5/wiki/SelectboxUsage Selectbox] : A lightweight dropdown list and it can support ListModel, Renderer, and Databinding as well.
